pages.text: Vampires are undead creatures with supernatural strength, speed, and thirst for blood. They are powerful but suffer from deadly weaknesses.

pages.title: Becoming a Vampire
pages.text: Players can become vampires by: \n- Being bitten by a vampire and dying. \n- Drinking Vampire Blood and dying.

pages.title: Weaknesses
pages.text:
- Sunlight burns unless protected. 
- Wooden weapons deal extra damage. 
- Vervain weakens and burns vampires. 
- Cannot use magic unless they become a Heretic.

pages.title: Vampire Abilities
pages.text: Vampires gain enhanced speed, strength, and regeneration. With training, they unlock abilities such as Compulsion, Blood Vision, and Shadow Dash.
